name: Gaio: Survive Amazon
description:
"Gaio: Survive Amazon" is a game made for Game Development classes. It focuses on the lives of amazon forest animals, in which the player controls a Parrots basic biological functions and social actions, spending ATP in the process. You follow the stories of the main character "Gaio" through nights, rain, fire and devastation.

Instructions:

Inhale by pressing "in" and exhale by pressing "out" in the top of the UI;

You need to keep breathing or else the parrot dies;

Interact in the options menu on the left to proceed in the story;

Make choises based on your statuses on the right;

enjoy the sounds and the ambience of the game!

The player inevitably dies because the game is an early prototype.
